item.title: Compare different compilation flags for RaspberryPi
item.description: Recently, I came across the very first version of the RaspberryPi, and I decided to experiment a bit with this old hardware. I was curious about how the performance of the volk library would differ depending on various compilation flags. arm1176jzf-s Firstly, it is necessary to determine the processor. As known, RaspberryPi uses a system-on-the-chip (SoC) from Broadcom. It is even written on the processor itself: Broadcom BCM2835. Inside this chip, there are several logical components:
